nodes.text: Head of Security was a title held by the commanding officer of the Royal Naboo Security Forces and individual personally responsible for the Monarch of Naboo's safety. By the Invasion of Naboo, Captain Quarsh Panaka served in the role. During the Clone Wars, Gregar Typho served as head of security for Senator Padmé Amidala. The title was also used by the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era.
